title: Arugula
description: Arugula – also called salad rocket – is known mainly in Italian cuisine as a spicy salad ingredient. It belongs to the mucus-forming seeds and is a light germ, so you should not cover the seeds for germination and spray them daily with water.

title: Chia
description: Best Chia seeds from European organic cultivation.

title: Daikon Radish
description: Daikon radish is an essential ingredient of Asian cuisine. It gained its popularity through its many different uses and its healthy ingredients.

title: Spinach
description: Even if Popeye prefers the canned version, we can highly recommend spinach as a microgreen! The mild, slightly bitter-salty taste is simply great – and super healthy on top of that.

title: Hemp Mat
description: It comes in dry and compressed form and can therefore be stored very well. Both as a growing medium for your private microgreen cultivation or for commercial microgreen projects, it offers a practical base. One hemp fiber mat fits perfectly in a 1010 tray.

title: Pressure sprayer
description: High-quality pressure storage sprayer with a capacity of 1.75 litres for microgreen professionals. Spray in any position (360° function). Rotating and adjustable brass nozzle.

title: Coconut Soil Brick
description: Coconut soil is a great alternative to the classic soil. It comes in dry and pressed form and can therefore be stored very well. It provides a practical basis for both your Grow-Grow Nut and other Microgreen projects.

title: Miron Violet Glass Apothecary Bottle
description: Our Mironglas Apothecary Bottles are ideal for storing your larger quantities of seeds.

title: Heimgart Microgreens Starter Kit
description: Heimgart works without earth, additional watering and green thumbs. Only once watered, the first leaflets of the young seedlings sprout after only a few days.

title: Grow-Grow Nut Refill Package “Asian Festival”
description: Need a refill for your Grow-Grow Nut? This refill pack contains three coco soil bricks and the familiar seed varieties from your starter pack (Radish Daikon, Pak Choi & Kohlrabi Red).

title: Grow-Grow Nut Refill Pack “The Mikro Greens”
description: Need a refill for your Grow-Grow Nut? This refill pack contains three coco soil bricks and the familiar seed varieties from your starter pack (Mizuna, Cress & Red Cabbage).

title: Grow-Grow Nut Starter Set
description: From the shopping bag to the To Go cup to the cutlery – we produce an incredible amount of plastic waste. The Grow-Grow Nut allows you to grow Microgreens at home on your window sill – plastic-free! The Grow-Grow Nut is 100% biodegradable and just looks great. The first completely biodegradable microgreen breeding kit – Let’s grow!
